amendment.description: To provide for a process for interim security clearance for certain workers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4952 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4952 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S9604-9605) To provide for a process for interim security clearance for certain workers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4952 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4952 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Vitter.
